import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Card, CardBody, CardHeader, Progress, Row, Col, Button, Form, FormGroup, FormText, FormFeedback, Input, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, Label } from 'reactstrap'; import { AppSwitch } from '@coreui/react' import { throws } from 'assert'; class ClusterType extends Component{ selectState = { hdpSwitch: true, hdfSwitch: false, combinedSwitch: false, hdpVersion: 1, hdfVersion: 1, combinedVersion: 1 } changeState(origin) { if(origin="hdp"){ this.selectState.hdfSwitch = false; this.selectState.combinedSwitch = false; } } saveAndContinue = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); this.props.nextStep(); } back = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); this.props.prevStep(); } render(){ const { values } = this.props return(

Step 1: Choose a cluster type

   25%   HDP

 

Hortonworks Data Platform

Hortonworks Data Platform (HDP) helps enterprises gain insights from structured and unstructured data. It is an open source framework for distributed storage and processing of large, multi-source data sets.
HDF

 

Hortonworks Data Flow

Hortonworks DataFlow (HDF) is a scalable, real-time streaming analytics platform that ingests, curates and analyzes data for key insights and immediate actionable intelligence.
HDF+HDP

 

Combined Cluster

Combined HDP + HDF clusters allow you to leverage the best out of Hortonworks platforms. Manage all your services in one central place and build Edge to AI applications.
) } } export default ClusterType;
